maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/3.orig: Examine the insides of the vase
Yes, hello, I'm here.\. Is that you boss?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/3.text: Oui, bonjour, je suis là.\. C'est toi patron ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/3.orig: You sound weird today, boss.\. Please don't get angry again...
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/3.text: Tu as l'air bizarre aujourd'hui, patron.\. S'il te plait, ne te remet pas encore en colère...

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/3.orig: I am still laying low at the Solar Farm, just as you said.\. Everything is alright, yes?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/3.text: Je suis toujours caché à la Ferme Solaire, comme tu m'as demandé.\. Tout va bien ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/3.orig: Hello?\.\. Boss?\.\. Did anything go wrong?!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/3.text: Allo ?\.\. Boss ?\.\. Il y a un problème ?!

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/3.orig: Hey, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Hands off that vase!\. Stealing is prohibited, even for the fancy likes of you!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/3.text: Hé, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Touche pas à ce vase !\. Voler est interdit, même pour des gens stylés comme toi !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: I have nothing to offer human... yet.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Moi rien à offrir à humain... pour instant.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Return later, once Ancients have given you more blessings.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Retourner plus tard, quand Anciens aura accordé plus bénédiction.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Oui, I like this place! Everything is so bright and colorful.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Oui, j'aime bien cet endroit ! Tout est si coloré et plein de lumière.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: I'm... not getting on your nerves, right?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Je... ne te tape pas sur les nerfs, hein ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: You know... I'm aware that I talk a lot...
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Tu sais... Je sais que je parle beaucoup...

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: And you're very quiet most of the time, just listening.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Et que tu es toujours très silencieuse la plupart du temps, juste en train d'écouter.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: I just hope I'm not bothering you in that way...
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: J'espère juste que je ne t'embête pas avec mon bavardage...
Vraiment pas ? c'est OK pour toi ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Oh and I'm very much fine with you being so quiet.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Oh, et pour moi il n'y a aucun problème à ce que tu sois si silencieuse.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: You actually remind me of an old friend of mine...
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Tu me rappelles un ancien ami à moi...

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Still...\. I'd really like to know more about you.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Mais quand même...\. J'aurais bien aimé en savoir un peu plus sur toi.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: So maybe some day, if you feel like it, please tell me more about you!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Donc si un jour tu en as envie, tu peux m'en dire plus sur toi !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Well then... I suppose I better log off now.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Bon alors... J'imagine qu'il vaut mieux que je me déconnecte maintenant.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Well... you see, I still gotta do my part of the assignment.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Bien... tu sais, il faut encore que je fasse ma part du travail en groupe pour demain.
Donc pas de nuit blanche aujourd'hui, désolée.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: And again: Merci for playing with me and listening to my rambling.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Et encore : Merci d'avoir joué avec moi et pour ton écoute.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: That really helped me a lot.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Ça m'a vraiment fait du bien.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Don't worry, I'll hurry up with my work. I'll be back soon enough!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Ne t'inquiète pas, je vais me dépêcher de faire mon travail. Je serai de retour en un rien de temps !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: And don't forget about our race at the Faj'ro Temple!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Et n'oublie pas pour notre course au \v[area.heat-dng.name] !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Lea...\. I am sorry I cannot...
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Lea...\. Je suis désolé, je ne peux pas...

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: You are wondering about your \c[3]real life\c[0]...\. Correct?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Que tu te questionne à propos de ta \c[3]vie réelle\c[0]...\. C'est ça ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: I was afraid you would ask sooner or later.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: J'avais peur que tôt ou tard tu finisses par poser cette question.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: I am not sure if this is the right time...
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Je ne suis pas sûr si c'est le bon moment...
... Tu ne me laisses pas le choix.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Please promise me to stay calm.
Your \c[3]real self\c[0]...\. is currently in a \c[3]coma\c[0].
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Ton \c[3]véritable corps\c[0]...\. est actuellement dans le \c[3]coma\c[0].

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: You have been suffering from head trauma for several months now.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Tu souffres d'un traumatisme crânien depuis plusieurs mois maintenant.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: For some strange reason, it seems that you regained your consciousness within CrossWorlds.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Pour une raison inconnue, on dirait que tu as retrouvé ta conscience à l'intérieur de CrossWorlds.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: That is...\. why we play the game, Lea.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: C'est pour ça...\. que l'on joue à ce jeu, Lea.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: By recovering your memory in the game we hope that you will be able to wake up in real life.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: On espère qu'en continuant à retrouver ta mémoire dans le jeu, tu finisses par te réveiller.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: We still have everything under control, okay?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Tout est encore sous contrôle, OK ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Your situation is serious, but this is no race against time.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Ta situation est sérieuse, mais ce n'est pas une course contre le temps.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: We just have to try out everything and hope for the best.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Il faut juste que l'on fasse tout ce qu'on peut et espérer pour le mieux.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: I am sorry that I could not bring myself to tell you this earlier...
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Je suis désolé de ne pas avoir voulu te l'expliquer plus tôt...

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: I just...\. I knew it would be difficult.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: C'est juste...\. Je savais que cela serait difficile.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: I really cannot imagine how you must feel right now.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Je ne peux pas imaginer comment tu dois te sentir maintenant.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: All I can tell you is that there is hope...
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Tout ce que je peux te dire, c'est qu'il y a encore de l'espoir...
... si on continue de jouer à CrossWorlds.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: So... let us not give up, okay?
Anyway, it is probably better to give you more time to cope with this.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Sinon, tu as probablement besoin d'un peu de temps pour digérer tout ça.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Should we call it a day?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Est-ce qu'on peut dire que c'est tout pour aujourd'hui ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Pretty human!\. Bestest, funnest toys for small ones!\. Make happy and cheer!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Ah, joli humain !\. Meilleurs jouets drôles pour petits hommes !\. Rendre heureux et gentil !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Human \v[lore.title.seeker] do search for troublemaker on market?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] humain chercher fauteur trouble du marché ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Hurray!\. Trade was hard times with money and goods being stolen.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Hourra !\. Affaires être difficiles quand argent et biens être volés.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Was worried guards lose interest in case.\. Mustache guard very watchful but he also speak much to rectangle.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Était inquiet que gardes plus intéressés par affaire.\. Garde à moustache regarde beaucoup, mais parle beaucoup au rectangle.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Yes yes!\. Weird small rectangle he sometimes talk to.\. Seem much importance to him.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Oui oui !\. Petit rectangle étrange avec qui beaucoup parler.\. Sembler très important pour lui.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Hope human find solution.\. We Shad like market and sharing our goods.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Espérer que humain trouve solution.\. Nous Shad aimer marché et marchander.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: The next dungeon is going to be \c[3]Faj'ro Temple\c[0].
As members of the \c[3]Omni Gilders\c[0] we have to gather as much loot as we can.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: En tant que membres des \c[3]Omni Gilders\c[0] il faut que nous récupérions autant de butin que possible.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: This is what this is about?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Donc c'est pour ça qu'on est là ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: I'm sure everyone knows how to hit stuff by now.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Depuis le temps, je suis sûr que tout le monde sait comment on frappe.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.orig: Sshh! This might be important, Jena!
Yes, as I said. We gotta get as much loot as we can.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/7.text: Oui, comme je disais. Il faut que l'on choppe tout le butin que l'on peut.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Hey bro, do you think we need a damage dealer at some point?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Hé, mec, t'es sûr qu'on ne va pas avoir besoin d'un bourrin qui fait des dégâts ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: NEVER! We will tank everything!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: JAMAIS ! On va tout encaisser comme des tanks !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Twin tank bros all the way.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Les frères jumeaux Tanks sont invincibles.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Alright, exactly what I wanted to hear.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Bien, c'est exactement ce que je voulais entendre !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: You ever wonder what these do?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Tu te demandes jamais à quoi ça sert ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Maybe they are for maintenance?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Peut-être qu'ils sont là pour la maintenance ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Or maybe they are generators?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Où peut-être que ce sont des générateurs ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: So basically, you're as clueless as I am?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Donc en fait, tu en as aucune idée, comme moi ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Yup.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Ouaip.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Wow, the bird guy wasn't lying. That's one big bazaar, non?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Ouah ! Le type oiseau ne mentait pas. C'est vraiment un grand bazar, non ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Shad try to trade as much as they can.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Marchander, pour les Shads, ça doit être une passion.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Sometimes, they do over-promote I guess.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Parfois, ils en font un peu trop pour présenter les choses.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Billston
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Billston

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Billston
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Billston

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: What is it, \v[lore.title.seeker]?\. Can't you see that I am busy keeping order in this unruly place?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a, \v[lore.title.seeker] ?\. Vous ne voyez pas que je suis occupé à maintenir l'ordre dans cet endroit mal famé ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Billston
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Billston

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: What is it, \v[lore.title.seeker]?\. Can't you see that I am busy keeping order in this unruly place?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a, \v[lore.title.seeker] ?\. Vous ne voyez pas que je suis occupé à maintenir l'ordre dans cet endroit mal famé ?
... Salut !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Shad merchants being robbed, is that the story of the day again?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Des marchands Shads qui se font voler, c'est encore ça l'histoire du jour ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: That is completely impossible.\. Not on my watch anyway.\. And it's always my watch during business hours!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: C'est complètement impossible.\. En tout cas, pas pendant mon tour de garde.\. Et c'est toujours moi qui garde pendant les heures d'ouvertures !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Listen, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. I know your kind always searches for grand adventures and villains to slay.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Écoutez, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Je sais que les gens comme vous sont toujours à la recherche d'aventures et de vilains à terrasser.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: But this is just some village ploy by them shady scaleskins to cash in on compensations.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Mais c'est juste des mythes de la part de ces peaux d'écailles pour recevoir des dédommagements.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Anyway, there is watch to keep.\. Don't waste my time, unless you can present some solid proof.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: En tout cas, il faut que je monte la garde.\. Donc ne gaspillez pas mon temps, sauf si vous avez des preuves solides.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: ...bye.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: ... Bye.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Billston
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Billston

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: There is watch to keep.\. Don't waste my time, unless you can present some solid proof.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Il faut que je monte la garde.\. Donc ne gaspillez pas mon temps, sauf si vous avez des preuves solides.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: ...bye.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: ... Bye.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Billston
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Billston

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: There is watch to keep.\. Don't waste my time, unless you can present some solid proof.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Il faut que je monte la garde.\. Donc ne gaspillez pas mon temps, sauf si vous avez des preuves solides.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: ...bye.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: ... Bye.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Jimmons
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Jimmons

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Zaida
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Zaida

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Zaida
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Zaida

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: When I first arrived here, the strange beings we call \v[lore.title.shad] made me uneasy.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: La première fois que je suis arrivé ici, ces gens étranges qu'on appelle les Shads me mettaient mal à l'aise.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: But soon I learned what honorable people they were beneath their scaly skin.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Mais j'ai rapidement appris à quel point ils étaient respectables derrière leur peau d'écailles.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Nowadays I love serving in this small village.\. It is so peaceful here, compared to the larger human settlements!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Depuis j'adore travailler dans ce petit village.\. Il est si paisible, comparé aux autres colonies humaines plus grandes !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Zaida
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Zaida

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Hi.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Salut.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Hey \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Can I help you with anything?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Hé, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Est-ce que je peux vous aider pour quelque chose ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Lea...
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Lea...

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Ah, you are here because of those criminal activities here on the market?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Ah, tu es là à cause de ces activités criminelles au marché ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I see, so the Sergeant is finally losing his patience.\. I can't blame him.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Je vois, donc le sergent perd finalement patience.\. Je ne peux pas le blâmer.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Listen, I want this to be solved as much as he does.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Moi aussi j'aimerais bien que cette affaire soit résolue.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: The Shad are an honest and trusting folk, they don't deserve this.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Les Shads sont honnêtes et respectueux, ils ne méritent pas ça.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Just... it always happens without anyone of us or the traders noticing.\. We are completely at a loss!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: C'est juste... que ça se passe toujours sans que nous ou les marchands s'en aperçoivent.\. On arrive pas à comprendre !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Honestly, one would think that at least Billston would notice something, that crazy workaholic.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Honnêtement, même Billston qui surveille comme un vrai chien de garde n'a rien remarqué.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: But no, the stuff seems to just vanish without any trace.\. Unbelievable.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Mais non, les choses semblent disparaitre sans laisser de traces.\. Incroyable.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Zaida
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Zaida

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I hope you can find anything, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: J'espère que vous trouverez quelque chose, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: The Shad are an honest and trusting folk, they don't deserve this.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Les Shads sont honnêtes et respectueux, ils ne méritent pas ça.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Pae'trow
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Pae'trow

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Pae'trow
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Pae'trow

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Human!\. Got quality tableware for sale!\. Best craftworks, it much smooth!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Humain !\. Avoir tables très chouette à vendre !\. Bon travail faire main, très lisse !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [shakes head]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Such shame.\. Human table have sad.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Très dommage.\. Humain fabriquer tables tristes.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Pae'trow
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Pae'trow

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Hi!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Salut !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Human asking about crime on market?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Humain demande à propos crimes au marché ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: It big problem!\. Goods and money vanishing from market stand.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Être gros problème !\. Biens et argent disparaitre de étal.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: We Shad busy selling quality crafts for fair price to happy customers, so no notice!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Nous Shad occupés à vendre marchandises qualité pour prix raisonnable et rendre acheteur heureux, donc rien remarquer !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: But bearded guard, he care very much!\. Always visiting, asking about money, food breaks and giving hints for safety!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Mais garde barbu, lui occuper de nous !\. Toujours visiter, demander à propos d'argent, de pause déjeuner et donner astuce pour sécurité !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Still things get stolen.\. He very disappoint and sad I fear.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Mais choses encore volées.\. Lui très déçu et triste, moi craindre.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Pae'trow
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Pae'trow

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Hope human find solution.\. We Shad like market and sharing our goods.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Espérer que humain trouve solution.\. Nous Shad aimer marché et marchander.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Possible Hint?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Indice Potentiel ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Kney'tehab
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Kney'tehab

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Kney'tehab
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Kney'tehab

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Human, take look over market!\. Baki Bazaar crafts are finest on Shadoon!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Humain, regarder le marché !\. Bazar de Baki avoir meilleurs marchandises de Shadoon !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Also, all profit go to hardworking \v[lore.title.shad] and helping humans.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Sinon, tous profits aller à \v[lore.title.shad]s travaillant dur et pour aider humains.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Kney'tehab
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Kney'tehab

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Hi!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Salut !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker], you are greeted!\. Much pleasing is felt from heroic presence.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Ah, \v[lore.title.seeker], vous être bienvenu !!\. Beaucoup plaisir à voir héros.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Much useful wisdom could be learned from communication, I dare proclaim with greatest certainty.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Grande sagesse utile pourrait être apprise par communication, moi oser dire avec grande certitude.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: But, as humans like saying, time is of the essential ingredient for early bird.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Mais, comme humains dire, temps être ingrédient essentiel pour lève-tôt.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: To honor clever statement, let us swiftly slice core of problem at our hand.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Pour respecter parole judicieuse, parlons vite de problème important.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Transport with important content is long expected to arrive from \v[area.bergen.name].\. It has not.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Transport avec contenu important attendu depuis longtemps de \v[area.bergen.name].\. Toujours pas là.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Content very precious and important.\. Desert dangerous.\. Human following?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Contenu très précieux et important.\. Désert dangereux.\. Humain suivre ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Excellent.\.\. Concluding, you, strong \v[lore.title.seeker], find transport and help it reach us.\. Then get reward, yes?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Excellent.\.\. Donc vous, fort \v[lore.title.seeker], trouver transport et aider à rejoindre nous.\. Puis recevoir récompense, oui ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Please.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: S'il vous plait.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: That good decision, smart human.\. Wealth awaits the both of us!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Ça bonne décision, humain intelligent.\. Richesse attendre nous deux !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Search transport along main route from \v[area.bergen.name] to \v[area.heat-village.name].
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Chercher transport sur route principale entre \v[area.bergen.name] et \v[area.heat-village.name].

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Should be guarded by two employees of generous Baki Bazaar.\. Unless eaten by hungry desertlife.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Devrait être gardé par deux bons employés de Bazar de Baki.\. Sauf si mangé par faune sauvage affamée.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: If still alive, complain about delay.\. Then help delivery to continue.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Si toujours en vie, alors râler pour retard.\. Puis aider à livraison.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: If eaten... shame, but business must go on.\. Return for less convenient plan B.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Si mangé... dommage, mais affaire doit continuer.\. Revenir pour Plan B moins pratique.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Bye.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Bye.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [shakes head]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Human certain?\. No interest in progress of shad and humans?\. Sad.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Humain certain ?\. Pas intéressé par progrès pour humain et Shad ?\. Dommage.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Kney'tehab
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Kney'tehab

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Search transport along main route from \v[area.bergen.name] to \v[area.heat-village.name].
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Chercher transport sur route principale entre \v[area.bergen.name] et \v[area.heat-village.name].

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Also find two delivery assistants and help.\. If alive.\. If not, shame, but you return for plan B.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Aussi trouver deux assistants et aider.\. Si vivant.\. Si non, dommage, mais revenir pour plan B.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Kney'tehab
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Kney'tehab

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Hi!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Salut !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker] returned.\. So has transport.\. Our thanks are boundless.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] revenu.\. Comme transport.\. Remerciements sans limite.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Rewards not boundless but still big.\. Human deserve it for bringing great contribution.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Récompense pas sans limite mais grosse.\. Humain le mériter pour grande contribution.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: The Union is of hope for grand cooperation continuing in future!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Union des bazars espère grande coopération continuer dans futur !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Bye!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Bye !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Kney'tehab
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Kney'tehab

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Hi!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Salut !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Ah, human \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Return brings great joy.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Ah, humain \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Retour apporter grande joie.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: It seem that indeed nose for business is among the many talents of the \v[lore.title.seeker].
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: On dirait que nez pour affaire aussi faire partie des nombreux talents de \v[lore.title.seeker]s.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: In way of any, \v[lore.title.seeker] remember important delivery and unreliable employees?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Comme toujours, \v[lore.title.seeker] souvenir livraison importante et employés peu fiables ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Well, forget employees, they not important now.\. But content of crate is very much.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Bon, oublier employés, pas important maintenant.\. Mais contenu de caisse très important.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: It core ingredient for profitable venture of great benefits:\. \c[3]Creating drinks of enjoyment, in way of Ancients!\c[0]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Contenu être ingrédient pour affaire avec grand bénéfice :\. \c[3]Créer boissons donnant joie de vivre, fait avec manière des Anciens !\c[0]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker] interested in more work?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] intéressé par autre travail ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Human thirst for profit express signs of starving wolf.\. This tip scales of trade in most pleasant direction.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Appétit humain pour profit exprime signe de loup affamé.\. Ça faire pencher balance du marché dans bonne direction.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Scales however rare in this venture, since \v[lore.title.seeker] work with other human.\. Not bad luck we hope.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Écailles rare dans affaire, car \v[lore.title.seeker] travailler avec autres humains.\. Nous espérer pas malchance.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: You speak to \c[3]human woman with red hair\c[0] in the \c[3]trade-building behind me\c[0].\. She very popular, hard to miss I often hear.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Vous parler à \c[3]femme humaine avec cheveux rouges\c[0] dans \c[3]bâtiment du marché derrière moi\c[0].\. Elle très populaire, difficile à rater, moi entendre souvent.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Contents of precious chest will already be used by woman so work can start with hastiness.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Contenu de caisse précieuse être déjà utilisé par femme donc travail peut commencer rapidement.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Rest will be explained in human to human meeting.\. \v[lore.title.seeker] brain absorbed procedure?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Reste sera expliqué entre humains.\. Cerveau de \v[lore.title.seeker] avoir tout compris ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Excellent.\. Then make hurry and do progress!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Excellent.\. Donc dépêchez-vous et faire progrès monde !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Bye.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Bye.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [shakes head]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker] not want to reap fruit of mystery chest?\. Sun done damage to curiosity of brain?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] pas vouloir chercher mystère de caisse ?\. Soleil avoir fait dégâts à curiosité du cerveau ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Kney'tehab
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Kney'tehab

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: You speak to \c[3]woman with red hair\c[0] in \c[3]Trade house\c[0].\. Easy to find, she very popular for reasons of mystery.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Vous parler à \c[3]femme avec cheveux rouges\c[0] dans \c[3]bâtiment du marché\c[0].\. Facile à trouver, elle très populaire pour raison mystérieuse.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Kney'tehab
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Kney'tehab

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Hi!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Salut !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: \v[lore.title.seeker]! Happy report of success already flew into reach.\. Splendid!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] ! Déjà avoir vent de grande réussite.\. Splendide !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Already sight is filled with smell of sweetness and taste of ripened drink... and lush profits, not to forget.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Moi déjà voir horizon de odeur sucrée et goût de boisson... Et beaucoup argent, ne pas oublier.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Also brewed liquid miraculous creator of friendship and persuasion according to human myths of trade.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Aussi avoir brassé liquide miraculeux pour amitié et persuasion, d'après mythes humains des affaires.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Yes, yes.\. This indeed might be venture of century for bazaar.\. \v[lore.title.seeker] get regal reward and thanks from heart!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Oui, oui.\. Ça peut-être affaire du siècle pour bazar.\. \v[lore.title.seeker], prendre récompense et merci de fond du cœur !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Kney'tehab
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Kney'tehab

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Human, take look over market!\. Baki Bazaar crafts are finest on Shadoon!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Humain, regarder le marché !\. Bazar de Baki avoir meilleurs marchandises de Shadoon !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Also, all profit go to hardworking \v[lore.title.shad] and helping humans.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Sinon, tous profits aller à \v[lore.title.shad]s travaillant dur et pour aider humains.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Initializing avatar
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Initialisation avatar

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Good morning, Lea.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Bonjour, Lea !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Are you okay?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Tout va bien ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: You look scared...
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Tu as l'air d'être effrayée...

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Did you have a bad dream?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Tu as eu un mauvais rêve ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: That is unfortunate...
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: C'est regrettable...

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I mean, it is a good thing that you have those dreams.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Je veux dire, c'est une bonne chose que tu aies ces rêves.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: After all, they are the gateway to your lost memory.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Après tout, ce sont des passerelles vers ta mémoire perdue.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: But of course, they also include the things you would rather not remember.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Mais naturellement, ils contiennent aussi les choses dont tu ne préfèrerais pas te souvenir.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I assume you do not precisely remember any people or places yet, do you?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: J'imagine que tu ne te souviens pas encore précisément d'endroits ou de gens, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [shakes head]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Okay.\. We just have to give it enough time.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: C'est bon.\. Il faut juste que l'on y passe plus de temps.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Anyway. I thought it would be better for you to have some company today.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Sinon... Je me disais que ce serait mieux si tu pouvais avoir un peu de compagnie aujourd'hui.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: ... after all the things I told you yesterday ...
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: ... après tout ce que je t'ai dit hier...

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: So I planned to wait until Emilie was online, but it seems she is rather busy at the moment.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Donc je pensais attendre qu'Emilie soit en ligne, mais on dirait qu'elle a l'air assez occupée en ce moment.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: But then I noticed that this Hexacast person went online.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Mais j'ai vu que ce joueur Hexacast vient de se connecter.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: The one that contacted you yesterday, remember?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Celui qui t'a contacté hier, tu te rappelles ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Why not give him a call?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Pourquoi ne pas l'appeler ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Hi!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Salut !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Oh! Good morning, Lea!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Oh ! Bonjour, Lea !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: How are you doing?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Comment vas-tu ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Drat! I forgot.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Ah, Mince ! J'avais oublié.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Uhm...\. I hope you're doing fine?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Hum...\. J'espère que tu vas bien ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: So...\. should we start a party today?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Donc...\. est-ce qu'on devrait former un groupe aujourd'hui ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Okey-dokey!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Dacodac !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: How about we meet at the \c[3]West Entrance\c[0] Landmark, the one right to the \c[3]north of Ba'kii Kum\c[0]?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Qu'est-ce que t'en dis si on se rencontre au point de repère de l'\c[3]\v[area.heat-area.landmark.name.exit]\c[0], celui juste au \c[3]nord de \v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0] ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Alright!\. I'll be right there!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Bien !\. J'arrive tout de suite !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Bye!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Bye !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Meet \c[3]C'tron\c[0] at the \c[3]West Entrance\c[0] Landmark to the north of \c[3]Ba'kii Kum\c[0].
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Rencontrez \c[3]C'tron\c[0] au point de repère de l'\c[3]\v[area.heat-area.landmark.name.exit]\c[0] au nord de \c[3]\v[area.heat-village.name]\c[0].

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Here we are.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Nous y voilà.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: It seems like Emilie is still busy with the Maroon Tree Cave.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: On dirait qu'Emilie est encore occupée avec la Grotte du Marronnier.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Well...\. I guess I'll have a look around the market.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Bon...\. Je pense que je vais faire un tour au marché.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Feel free to join me.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Tu peux venir avec moi si tu veux.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Oh.\. It's you.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Oh.\. C'est toi.
... Salut.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Hm.\. Are you looking for my friend?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Hm.\. Est-ce que tu cherches mon ami ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: He's not here.\. I plan to meet him soon, though.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Il n'est pas là.\. Mais je vais le retrouver bientôt, par contre.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I heard you've been dueling, hm?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: J'ai entendu que vous aviez eu un duel ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: And you even managed to defeat him.\. Because you \c[1]cheated\c[0], he says.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Et tu as même réussi à le battre.\. Parce que tu aurais \c[1]triché\c[0], selon lui.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Sounds like a sore loser to me.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Moi je pense plutôt que c'est un mauvais perdant.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: And you even managed to defeat him.\. He was impressed.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Et tu as même réussi à le battre.\. Il était impressionné.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: He told me you still have much to learn. I suppose you lost that match, hm?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Il m'a dit que tu avais encore beaucoup à apprendre. Je devine que tu as perdu, hmm ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: What'd you expect? He's an experienced player after all.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Tu t'attendais à quoi ? C'est un joueur expérimenté, après tout.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Anyways, he talks a lot about you. Almost makes me jealous.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: En tout cas, depuis, il parle souvent de toi. Ça me rendrait presque jaloux.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Hm.\. A girl of few words, aren't you?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Hmm.\. Une fille avec peu de mots, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: It looks like you don't appreciate his attention.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: On dirait que tu n'apprécies pas vraiment son attention.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [shakes head]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: What can I say?\. That's just him.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Qu'est-ce que je peux dire ?\. Il est juste comme ça.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Always obsessed with strangers. Especially Spheromancers.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Toujours obsédé par les étrangers. Surtout les Spheromanceurs.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: So you'd rather avoid him, right?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Donc tu préfères l'éviter, c'est ça ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Better leave then before he runs into you.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Alors tu ferais mieux de partir avant qu'il vienne te voir.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Bye!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Bye !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Bye.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Bye.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Ah, there you are. I was just browsing consumables.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Ah, te voilà. J'étais juste en train de regarder quelques consommables.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: It's kinda funny how they decorate it with all those fruits you actually can't buy, isn't it?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: C'est assez drôle que tout soit décoré avec des fruits que l'on ne peut pas acheter, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Ah, that reminds me!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Ah, ça me rappelle...

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I heard you can still count with your fingers, right?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: J'ai entendu dire que tu pouvais quand même compter avec tes doigts, c'est vrai ?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.note: de: malgré ta barrière de parole

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Pretty much!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Effectivement !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: It's actually quite amazing how precisely they managed to synchronize your dexterity.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: C'est assez fascinant avec quelle précision ils ont réussis à synchroniser ta dextérité dans le jeu.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: That means you can move your fingers as much as you could in real life. Wanna give it a try?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Ça veut dire que tu peux bouger des doigts comme tu pourrais le faire dans la vie réelle. Tu veux essayer ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Try this!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Essaye ça !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Now this!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Maintenant ça !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: And now this!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Et maintenant ça !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Yeah, that one isn't for everybody.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Oui~, bon, celui-là n'est pas pour tout le monde.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Anyway, since you can mimic things with your hands, maybe sign language would be an option for communication?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: En tout cas, avec la dextérité des doigts que tu as, peut-être que le langage des signes serait une possibilité pour communiquer ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Well...\. I guess it'd be a bother to learn it.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Mais bon...\. Je pense que ça demanderait beaucoup d'efforts pour apprendre ça.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Also, I guess most other players don't know sign language either.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Et sinon, j'imagine que la plupart des autres joueurs ne connaissent pas le langage des signes non plus.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: We really wouldn't have this problem if they'd simply support text-based communication.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: On n'aurait pas eu ce problème s'ils supportaient la communication à base de texte.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: But they removed it all. Because of "immersion".
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Mais ils l'ont complètement enlevé. À cause de l'"immersion".

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: People have complained about this before.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Les gens se sont déjà plaints de ça auparavant.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I did it!\. I defeated that red worm!\. Finally!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: J'ai réussi !\. J'ai vaincu ce ver rouge !\. Enfin !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Congratulations!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Félicitations !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: But man, those worms were annoying. So hard to punch.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Boah, mais ces vers étaient peut-être un peu agaçants. Il fallait constamment bouger pour les frapper.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I guess projectiles would have been more feasible?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: J'imagine que des projectiles auraient été plus pratiques ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I'm a Pentafist, non? What do you think my fists are for?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Mais je suis un Pentafist ! Tu crois que mes poings servent à quoi ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: ... Well...
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: ... Ahh oui...

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Anyway, I'll head back to Ba'kii Kum now! See you soon!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: En tout cas, je suis sur le chemin du retour. À bientôt !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Bye!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Bye !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Okey-dokey!\. Let's go back to the \c[3]quest hub\c[0], then!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Dacodac !\. Retournons au \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0], alors !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: ...Is something the matter, Lea?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: ... Tout va bien, Lea ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Uhm...\. anyway...\. Let's just go, okay?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Euh...\. Bon...\. Allons-y, OK ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Blue-haired Spheromancer!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Spheromanceuse aux Cheveux Bleus !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: So we meet again!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: On se rencontre à nouveau !
... Salut.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Sorry.\. He spotted you as you left.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Désolé.\. Il t'a vu quand tu es partie.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Uhm, hello!\. I'm C'tron.\. I suppose you know each other?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Euh, bonjour !\. Je suis C'tron.\. Je devine que vous vous connaissez ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I see you found yourself another party member, Spheromancer!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Je vois que tu t'es trouvé un autre partenaire de groupe, Spheromanceuse !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Lea.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Lea.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Not that you'd \c[1]NEED\c[0] the help of a party, being the \c[1]BLATANT CHEATER\c[0] you are!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Non pas que tu aies \c[1]BESOIN\c[0] de l'aide d'un groupe, en étant une \c[1]TRICHEUSE FLAGRANTE\c[0] !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I've come back to STOP this disingenuous behavior of yours!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Je suis revenu pour faire CESSER ton comportement malhonnête !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Anyway!\. I'm glad to see you progressed this far into the game!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: En tout cas je me réjouis de voir que tu sois allée aussi loin dans le jeu !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: It is due time to put your skills to another test!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Il est grand temps de mettre tes compétences à l'épreuve !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Blue-haired Spheromancer!\. I challenge you to another \c[3]duel\c[0]!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Spheromanceuse aux Cheveux Bleus !\. Je te mets au défi de me battre à nouveau en \c[3]duel\c[0] !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Lea.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Lea.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Here I am!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Me voilà !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Oh no!\. It's Monsieur Grasshead.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Oh non !\. C'est Monsieur Tête-d'Herbe.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Do you accept, Spheromancer?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Est-ce que tu acceptes, Spheromanceuse ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Oh!\. Is it another duel?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Oh !\. C'est encore un autre duel ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Haha...\. why'd he do that, though?\. Really, now?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Haha...\. Pourquoi il fait ça ? Il en a pas eu assez de la dernière fois ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Come on, Lea!\. His derrière deserves another beating!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Aller, Lea !\. Son derrière mérite encore d'être botté !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Come on, Lea!\. It's your chance to get your revenge!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Aller, Lea !\. C'est une chance pour prendre ta revanche !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: What is it?\. You seem less eager this time.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?\. Tu sembles moins volontaire cette fois.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Do you accept, Spheromancer?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Est-ce que tu acceptes, Spheromanceuse ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: LEA!!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: LEA !!

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Seriously.\. This is stupid.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Non mais sérieusement.\. C'est débile.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Use her name already.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Appelle-la par son nom, bon sang.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: THIS CHEATER DOES NOT GET TO CHOOSE WHAT I CALL HER!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: CETTE TRICHEUSE NE MÉRITE PAS DE CHOISIR COMMENT JE L'APPELLE !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Well, whatever it takes...
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Bon, s'il le faut...

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Is this important to you?\. Well then.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: C'est si important pour toi ?\. Bon, alors.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Accept the duel!\. If you earn my respect, I might call you by your name!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Accepte le duel !\. Si tu mérites mon respect, je t'appellerais peut-être par ton nom !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Do you accept?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Est-ce que tu acceptes ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: [acquiesce]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Good!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Bien !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Let's meet in front of the Faj'ro Temple!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Rencontrons-nous en face du \v[area.heat-dng.name] !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I'll be expecting you.\. Make sure to be well prepared!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Je t'attendrai.\. Assure-toi d'être bien préparée !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: See you soon, Spheromancer!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: À bientôt, Spheromanceuse !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: ... Bye.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: ... Bye.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Oh bother.\. Sometimes I wonder why I keep up with that oddball.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Eh ben.\. Parfois je me demande pourquoi je reste avec un olibrius pareil.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: See you around.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: À plus.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I'm confused.\. Who was that?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Je suis perdu.\. C'était qui ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Oh.\. He's some kind of self proclaimed Justice guy.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Oh.\. C'est une sorte de justicier auto-proclamé.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Thinks really highly of Spheromancers.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Qui possède un grand respect pour les Spheromanceurs.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Lea kicked his derrière!
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Lea lui a déjà botté les fesses !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I see.\. What a...\. unique character.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Je vois.\. Un type...\. unique en son genre.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Oui, he's an idiot.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Ouais, c'est un idiot.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: [nods]

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Agreed!\. I guess next we should report to the Eldress, right?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I wonder if we ever get to fight those huge space birds.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Eh...\. I haven't heard of that, yet.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: So this is your first time playing CrossWorlds, too?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Donc c'est aussi la première fois que tu joues à CrossWorlds ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Pretty much. But I know some people who've played longer.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Oui c'est ça. Mais je connais quelques personnes qui y ont joués plus longtemps.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Oh, like the other guild members?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Oh, tu veux dire les autres membres de la guilde ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Ah, no. Not them. I don't know them personally.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Ah non, pas eux. Je ne les connais pas personnellement.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I just joined the First Scholars because they seemed like fun.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Je les ai rejoins malgré tout, parce qu'ils avaient l'air d'être marrants.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: I like that they're not all about the gameplay.\. It's funny how Hlin tries to get the most out of the lore and all.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Ça m'a plu qu'ils n'étaient pas obnubilés par le gameplay.\. C'est marrant de voir comment Hlin cherche à découvrir ce qui se cache derrière le folklore et tout.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Ah oui, ça a l'air d'être fun !

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Anyway...\. Next is Faj'ro Temple.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Still wouldn't hurt to do a few more quests, right?
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Mais bon, ça ne ferait pas de mal de faire quelques quêtes avant, n'est-ce pas ?

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: You should make sure you're well prepared.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Tu devrais t'assurer d'être bien préparée alors.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: You know...\. solve some quests, upgrade your equipment and all that.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: But I think it's a trap.
maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.text: Mais je crois que c'est un piège.

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Come on, don't be such a chicken!

maps/heat-village/baki-2.json/entities/8.orig: Well, if you want it so bad, why don't you go?
